How to Play

Press the A key to walk left. 
Press the D key to walk right.
Press the P key to attack.
Press the Spacebar to jump.

Role

  • Michael, the leader of the army, has a brave heart, is a hero for people, always bringing what is right.
  • Lucifer, who aims to conquer Skyvia. It was a demon that devoured fear into power.

Game Story

        Challenging millions of years and the peaceful Disney Island (Skyvia) and nothing more is certain. With orders, Bird interacted with explorers, Lucius made a choice like Michaeli... and got it. most likely Before he might explode, Explode Wisdom, Explode after millions of years, the peaceful Heaven and Sky Island (Skyvia). and there seemed to be no more evil. but discovered the fact that after Lucifer had defeated Michael until he was seriously injured and eventually died. Before his death, he had left a fragment of his soul on the sky island. Waiting for the day when the people of the sky are afraid Until an outbreak of a virus on the island of the sky. The inhabitants of the sky were so frightened that Lucifer's soul devoured the fear of the people of the sky and formed a demonic form again. And when the time came, he led the demon army to attack Skyvia once more. The excess of vengeance made the demon powerful and carried a wide variety of evils. No matter how the giant ghost from fear of the devil virus, no one could stop it.

Scene1

After the Lord had heard of Lucifer's death and the fragments had commanded.
had Michael come down and find the fragment to destroy, but He charged that do not reveal themselves and must blend in with the inhabitants of the Skyvia

Map1

Michael descends to the Sky Island and blends in with the villagers and finds that Skyvia is half eaten by the devil. All the Skyvias have migrated and hid from the demons. 

Map2-6

On his way out, he met many demons, causing him to wonder how the demons came out, so he defeated many demons.

Scene2

Michael meets the caretaker in a marginal state that cannot withstand the demons.
So he directed Michael to enter the portal to deal with the real demons.

Scene3

Until I found the fact that Lucifer devoured his fear and regained his terrifying demonic form.

Map7

Michael again fights with Lucifer and kills.

Scene4 (The end)

The townspeople were glad that Michael had wiped out the evil from Skyvia.

Hope you enjoy this!!
